name: As Talk As Walk Wayfarer Team - One Percent Sleepy
name_original: As Talk As Walk Wayfarer Team - One Percent Sleepy
description:
Grab your Bag, pick up the Numbering Rod, look for the backboard on the ground that flashes black and white numbers, and stand on it at the right time:
The backplane with a white background can be used to charge a number to the Numbering Rod, and you can open the Bag to see the number on the Numbering Rod.
A backplane with a black background will reduce the number of Numbering Rod, so avoid it.
Wave the Numbering Rod and give the sheep a number, remember to charge the Numbering Rod that consumes the number.

The game is intended to express disengagement, contemplation, doubt, the one percent, hypnosis, wandering, and distress.
